channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Homes Under the Hammer
channel.desc: Martel is in Durham to see a three-bed semi with an array of original character features. Jacqui is just outside Great Yarmouth in Norfolk, visiting a double-fronted Victorian property with a varied and interesting history. Martin is in Newport, Wales, to see a two-bed mid-terrace with a Japanese knotweed issue that requires further investigation.
